Mercury Meltdown Revolution

Time Stop (A+B=On/Off) [Blaster99]
2032A6EC 00000C00
04063EF0 60000000
CC000000 00000000
04063EF0 EC420828
E0000000 80008000

Add Color (B+D=Red, B+U=Green, B+L=Blue) [Blaster99]
2032A6EC 00000401
04F3ED60 3F800000
E0000000 80008000
2032A6EC 00000402
04F3ED64 3F800000
E0000000 80008000
2032A6EC 00000408
04F3ED68 3F800000
E0000000 80008000
D=Down, U=Up, L=Left
